DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether talactoferrin improve overall survival patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) previously treat two regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Talactoferrin Previously Treated Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
